application-name.label: Application Name
application-name.hint: Identifies a group of forms (for example "acme" or "sales")
application-name.help:
The application name is a name which allows grouping form together. The application name (or app name) can be, for example:

  • a company name such as "orbeon" or "acme"
  • a company entity such as "hr" or "sales" or "engineering"
  • a project name such as "mercury" or "phoenix"

This name shows in the URL of the deployed form, so we recommend you use only lowercase characters.
application-name.alert: Use a maximum of 255 ASCII letters, digits, "-" or "_"

form-name.label: Form Name
form-name.help:
The Form name is a name which is local to an application name, for example "address" or "claim".

This name shows in the URL, so we recommend you use only lowercase characters.
form-name.alert: Use a maximum of 255 ASCII letters, digits, "-" or "_"
form-name.no-form-alert: No form with this specific application and form name in this system have been found in this system.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is visible or not.

  • Yes: The form control is visible.
  • No: The form control is hidden.
  • Formula: The form control is visible or hidden dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is visible or not. It must return a boolean value. The form control is visible if the formula evaluates to true(), and hidden if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their name preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

readonly.label: Read-Only
readonly.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write.

  • Yes: The form control is readonly.
  • No: The form control is read-write.
  • Formula: The form control is readonly or read-write dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write. It must return a boolean value. The form control is readonly if the formula evaluates to true(), and read-write if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their name preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

default.label: Initial Value
default.help:
This formula allows you to specify an initial value for the form control in "new" mode only.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their name preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

calculate.label: Calculated Value
calculate.help:
This formula allows you to specify a calculated value for the form control. This value is re-evaluated to remain up to date as needed.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their name preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: PLEASE NOTE: Publishing this form definition will create a new version of the form definition in the database. Data which already exists in the database will still be viewed and edited with the previous versions of this form definition which are associated with that data. The new form definition version will be used to create new data.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: PLEASE NOTE: This will overwrite the existing form definition. If the changes you have made to the form definition are small, such as changing control labels, the form definition will be compatible with existing form data. But if you have made structural changes, such as adding, removing, renaming, or moving controls, the form definition might be incompatible with existing data. We recommend being careful when overwriting an existing form definition version.

application-name.label: Nom de l'application
application-name.help:
Le nom de l'application est un nom qui permet de grouper des formulaires. Le nom d'application peut être, par exemple :

  • un nom de compagnie, comme "orbeon" ou "acme"
  • une entité dans une compagnie, comme "rh" ou "ventes" or "recherche"
  • un nom de projet comme "mercury" ou "phoenix"

Ce nom est visible dans l'URL du formulaire déployé, donc nous vous recommandons d'utiliser uniquement des minuscules.
application-name.alert: Utiliser au maximum 255 lettres ASCII, des chiffres, "-" ou "_"

form-name.label: Nom du formulaire
form-name.help:
Le nom du formulaire est un nom qui est local à une application, par exemple "adresse" ou "demande".

Ce nom est visible dans l'URL du formulaire déployé, donc nous vous recommandons d'utiliser uniquement des minuscules.
form-name.alert: Utiliser au maximum 255 lettres ASCII, des chiffres, "-" ou "_"
form-name.no-form-alert: Aucun formulaire avec ce nom d'application et nom de formulaire n'a été trouvé dans ce système.

visibility.label: Visibilité
visibility.help:
Ceci vous permet de spécifier si le contrôle de formulaire est visible ou non.

  • Oui : Le contrôle de formulaire est visible.
  • Non : Le contrôle de formulaire est caché.
  • Formule : Le contrôle de formulaire est visible ou caché dynamiquement en fonction d'une formule.

La formule vous permet de spécifier dynamiquement si le contrôle de formulaire est visible ou non. Elle doit renvoyer une valeur booléenne. Le contrôle de formulaire est visible si la formule évalue à true(), et caché si elle évalue à false().

Vous pouvez faire référence à d'autres contrôles de formulaire dans la formule en utilisant leur nom précédé d'un signe $. Lors de la saisie du signe $, une liste des contrôles de formulaire disponibles s'affiche.

Pour en savoir plus sur les formules, consultez la documentation du Form Builder.

readonly.label: Lecture seule
readonly.help:
Ceci vous permet de spécifier si le contrôle de formulaire est en lecture seule ou en lecture-écriture.

  • Oui : Le contrôle de formulaire est en lecture seule.
  • Non : Le contrôle de formulaire est en lecture-écriture.
  • Formule : Le contrôle de formulaire est en lecture seule ou en lecture-écriture dynamiquement en fonction d'une formule.

La formule vous permet de spécifier dynamiquement si le contrôle de formulaire est en lecture seule ou en lecture-écriture. Elle doit renvoyer une valeur booléenne. Le contrôle de formulaire est en lecture seule si la formule évalue à true(), et en lecture-écriture si elle évalue à false().

Vous pouvez faire référence à d'autres contrôles de formulaire dans la formule en utilisant leur nom précédé d'un signe $. Lors de la saisie du signe $, une liste des contrôles de formulaire disponibles s'affiche.

Pour en savoir plus sur les formules, consultez la documentation du Form Builder.

default.label: Valeur initiale
default.help:
Cette formule vous permet de spécifier une valeur initiale pour le contrôle de formulaire uniquement en mode "nouveau".

Vous pouvez faire référence à d'autres contrôles de formulaire dans la formule en utilisant leur nom précédé d'un signe $. Lors de la saisie du signe $, une liste des contrôles de formulaire disponibles s'affiche.

Pour en savoir plus sur les formules, consultez la documentation du Form Builder.

calculate.label: Valeur calculée
calculate.help:
Cette formule vous permet de spécifier une valeur calculée pour le contrôle de formulaire. Cette valeur est réévaluée pour rester à jour selon les besoins.

Vous pouvez faire référence à d'autres contrôles de formulaire dans la formule en utilisant leur nom précédé d'un signe $. Lors de la saisie du signe $, une liste des contrôles de formulaire disponibles s'affiche.

Pour en savoir plus sur les formules, consultez la documentation du Form Builder.

dialog-publish.publish-success: La définition de formulaire a été publiée avec succès sous la version {1,number,integer}, avec {0,choice,0#aucun fichiers joints|1#1 fichier joint|1<{0,number,integer} fichiers joints}.
dialog-publish.publish-error: Une erreur s'est produite durant la publication du formulaire.
dialog-publish.create-new-version-item: créer une nouvelle définition de formulaire avec numéro de version {0,number,integer}
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-item: remplacer la définition de formulaire avec numéro de version {0,number,integer} ({1,choice,0#non disponible|1#disponible})
dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: VEUILLEZ NOTER: Publier cette définition de formulaire va créer une nouvelle version dans la base de données. Les données existantes dans la base de donnée seront visualisées et éditées avec la ou les versions précédentes de la définition de formulaire qui sont associées avec ces données. La nouvelle définition de formulaire sera utilisée pour créer de nouvelles données.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: VEUILLEZ NOTER: Cette action va remplacer la définition de formulaire existante. Si les changements que vous avez faits à la définition de formulaire sont petits, par exemple renommer des libellés, la définition de formulaire sera compatible avec les données existantes. Par contre les changements structurels, tels que les ajouts, supressions, renommage, ou déplacement de contrôles, peuvent rendre la définition de formulaire incompatible avec les données existantes. Il est recommandé d'être prudent en remplaçant une définition de formulaire existante.

visibility.label: Synlighet
visibility.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is visible or not.

  • Yes: The form control is visible.
  • No: The form control is hidden.
  • Formula: The form control is visible or hidden dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is visible or not. It must return a boolean value. The form control is visible if the formula evaluates to true(), and hidden if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

readonly.label: Skrivebeskyttelse
readonly.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write.

  • Yes: The form control is readonly.
  • No: The form control is read-write.
  • Formula: The form control is readonly or read-write dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write. It must return a boolean value. The form control is readonly if the formula evaluates to true(), and read-write if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

default.label: Forhåndsutfylt verdi
default.help:
This formula allows you to specify an initial value for the form control in "new" mode only.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

calculate.label: Utregnet verdi
calculate.help:
This formula allows you to specify a calculated value for the form control. This value is re-evaluated to remain up to date as needed.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: PLEASE NOTE: Publishing this form definition will create a new version of the form definition in the database. Data which already exists in the database will still be viewed and edited with the previous versions of this form definition which are associated with that data. The new form definition version will be used to create new data.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: PLEASE NOTE: This will overwrite the existing form definition. If the changes you have made to the form definition are small, such as changing control labels, the form definition will be compatible with existing form data. But if you have made structural changes, such as adding, removing, renaming, or moving controls, the form definition might be incompatible with existing data. We recommend being careful when overwriting an existing form definition version.

application-name.label: Nome dell'applicazione
application-name.hint: Identifica un gruppo di moduli (ad esempio «acme» o «vendite»). Compare nell'URL del modulo pubblicato; usa solo lettere minuscole.
application-name.help:
Il nome dell'applicazione consente di raggruppare i moduli.

Esempi: un nome aziendale ("orbeon", "acme"), un reparto ("hr", "vendite"), oppure un progetto ("mercury").

Questo nome compare nell'URL del modulo pubblicato; si consiglia di usare solo minuscole.
application-name.alert: Utilizza un massimo di 255 lettere ASCII, cifre, "-" o "_"

form-name.label: Nome del modulo
form-name.hint: Identifica questo specifico modulo (ad esempio «pratica»). Compare nell'URL del modulo pubblicato; usa solo lettere minuscole.
form-name.help:
Il nome del modulo è locale a un'applicazione, ad esempio «indirizzo» o «pratica».

Questo nome compare nell'URL; usa solo lettere minuscole.
form-name.alert: Utilizza un massimo di 255 lettere ASCII, cifre, "-" o "_"

visibility.label: Visibiltà
visibility.help:
Consente di specificare se il controllo del modulo è visibile oppure no.

  • Sì: Il controllo è visibile.
  • No: Il controllo è nascosto.
  • Formula: La visibilità è determinata dinamicamente da una formula.

La formula deve restituire un valore booleano: il controllo è visibile se la formula vale true() e nascosto se vale false().

Puoi fare riferimento ad altri controlli usando i loro nomi preceduti dal simbolo $; digitando $ viene mostrato l'elenco dei controlli disponibili.

Per maggiori informazioni sulle formule, consulta la documentazione di Form Builder.

readonly.label: Solo lettura
readonly.help:
Consente di specificare se il controllo è in sola lettura oppure modificabile.

  • Sì: Il controllo è in sola lettura.
  • No: Il controllo è in lettura/scrittura.
  • Formula: Lo stato è determinato dinamicamente da una formula.

La formula deve restituire un booleano: true() per sola lettura, false() per lettura/scrittura.

È possibile fare riferimento ad altri controlli con $nomeControllo; digitando $ viene mostrato l'elenco dei controlli disponibili.

Per maggiori informazioni, vedi la documentazione di Form Builder.

default.label: Valore iniziale
default.help:
Consente di specificare un valore iniziale per il controllo, solo in modalità "nuovo".

Nella formula puoi riferirti ad altri controlli con $ seguito dal loro nome; digitando $ viene mostrato l'elenco dei controlli.

Per maggiori dettagli consulta la documentazione di Form Builder.

calculate.label: Valore calcolato
calculate.help:
Consente di specificare un valore calcolato per il controllo. Il valore viene rivalutato automaticamente quando necessario.

Puoi riferirti ad altri controlli con $ seguito dal nome del controllo; digitando $ viene mostrato l'elenco dei controlli.

Per ulteriori informazioni, vedi la documentazione di Form Builder.

dialog-publish.label: Pubblica modulo
dialog-publish.publish-success: La definizione di modulo è stata pubblicata con successo come versione {1,number,integer}, {0,choice,0#senza allegati|1#con 1 allegato|1<con {0,number,integer}allegati}.
dialog-publish.publish-error: Si è verificato un errore durante la pubblicazione del modulo.
dialog-publish.create-new-version-item: Crea una nuova definizione di modulo con il numero di versione {0,number,integer}
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-item: Sovrascrivi la definizione del modulo attuale con il numero di versione {0,number,integer} ({1,choice,0#non disponibile|1#disponibile})
dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: NOTA: La pubblicazione di questa definizione di modulo creerà una nuova versione della definizione del modulo nel database. I dati che esistono già nel database potranno ancora essere visualizzati e modificati con le versioni precedenti di questa definizione del modulo che sono associati con tali dati. La nuova versione della definizione del modulo verrà utilizzata per creare nuovi dati.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: NOTA: Questo sovrascriverà la definizione di modulo esistente. Se le modifiche apportate alla definizione di modulo sono piccole, come cambiare le etichette di controllo, la definizione del modulo sarà compatibile con i dati del modulo esistente. Ma se sono state apportate modifiche strutturali, come l'aggiunta, la rimozione, la ridenominazione, o il movimento dei controlli, la definizione di modulo potrebbe essere incompatibile con i dati esistenti. Si consiglia di essere attentiti quando sovrascrive una versione della definizione di modulo esistente.

application-name.label: Name der Anwendung
application-name.hint: Kennzeichnet eine Gruppe von Formularen (z. B. „acme“ oder „sales“)
application-name.help:
Der Anwendungsname ist ein Name, mit dem Formulare gruppiert werden können. Beispiele:

  • ein Firmenname wie „orbeon“ oder „acme“
  • eine Unternehmenseinheit wie „hr“, „sales“ oder „engineering“
  • ein Projektname wie „mercury“ oder „phoenix“

Dieser Name erscheint in der URL des bereitgestellten Formulars; verwenden Sie daher nur Kleinbuchstaben.
application-name.alert: Verwenden Sie maximal 255 ASCII-Buchstaben, Ziffern, „-" oder "_"

form-name.label: Name des Formulars
form-name.help:
Der Formularname ist ein Name, der innerhalb einer Anwendung eindeutig ist, z. B. „adresse“ oder „antrag“.

Dieser Name erscheint in der URL; verwenden Sie daher nur Kleinbuchstaben.
form-name.alert: Verwenden Sie maximal 255 ASCII-Buchstaben, Ziffern, "-" oder "_"

visibility.label: Sichtbarkeit
visibility.help:
Hier legen Sie fest, ob das Steuerelement sichtbar ist oder nicht.

  • Ja: Das Steuerelement ist sichtbar.
  • Nein: Das Steuerelement ist verborgen.
  • Formel: Sichtbarkeit wird dynamisch per Formel gesteuert.

Die Formel muss einen booleschen Wert liefern. Das Steuerelement ist sichtbar, wenn die Formel true() ergibt, und verborgen, wenn sie false() ergibt.

Sie können in der Formel auf andere Steuerelemente mit ihrem Namen, vorangestellt von $, verweisen. Beim Eingeben von $ wird eine Liste der verfügbaren Steuerelemente angezeigt.

Weitere Informationen zu Formeln finden Sie in der Form-Builder-Dokumentation.

readonly.label: Schreibgeschützt
readonly.help:
Hier legen Sie fest, ob das Steuerelement schreibgeschützt oder schreibbar ist.

  • Ja: Das Steuerelement ist schreibgeschützt.
  • Nein: Das Steuerelement ist schreibbar.
  • Formel: Schreibschutz wird dynamisch per Formel gesteuert.

Die Formel muss einen booleschen Wert liefern. Das Steuerelement ist schreibgeschützt, wenn die Formel true() ergibt, und schreibbar, wenn sie false() ergibt.

Sie können in der Formel auf andere Steuerelemente mit ihrem Namen, vorangestellt von $, verweisen. Beim Eingeben von $ wird eine Liste der verfügbaren Steuerelemente angezeigt.

Weitere Informationen zu Formeln finden Sie in der Form-Builder-Dokumentation.

default.label: Initialwert
default.help:
Diese Formel legt einen Initialwert für das Steuerelement fest (nur im Modus „Neu“).

Sie können in der Formel auf andere Steuerelemente mit ihrem Namen, vorangestellt von $, verweisen. Beim Eingeben von $ wird eine Liste der verfügbaren Steuerelemente angezeigt.

Weitere Informationen zu Formeln finden Sie in der Form-Builder-Dokumentation.

calculate.label: Berechneter Wert
calculate.help:
Diese Formel legt einen berechneten Wert für das Steuerelement fest. Der Wert wird bei Bedarf neu ausgewertet.

Sie können in der Formel auf andere Steuerelemente mit ihrem Namen, vorangestellt von $, verweisen. Beim Eingeben von $ wird eine Liste der verfügbaren Steuerelemente angezeigt.

Weitere Informationen zu Formeln finden Sie in der Form-Builder-Dokumentation.

dialog-publish.publish-error: Beim Veröffentlichen des Formulars ist ein Fehler aufgetreten.
dialog-publish.create-new-version-item: Erstelle eine neue Formulardefinition mit der Versionsnummer {0,number,integer}
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-item: Überschreibe die aktuelle Formulardefinition mit Versionsnummer {0,number,integer} ({1,choice,0#nicht verfügbar|1#verfügbar})
dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: BITTE BEACHTEN SIE: Die Veröffentlichung dieser Formulardefinition erstellt eine neue Version der Formulardefiniton in der Datenbank. Daten, die sich bereits in der Datenbank befinden können noch in den vorherigen Versionen der Formulardefintion angezeigt und bearbeitet werden, welche mit ihnen verknüpft ist. Die neue Version der Formulardefinition wird verwendet, um neue Daten zu erstellen.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: BITTE BEACHTEN SIE: Das wird die bestehende Formulardefinition überschreiben. Wenn die Änderungen, die Sie vorgenommen haben klein sind, wie z.B. Änderung der Beschriftungen der Steuerelemente, wird die Formulardefinition mit den existierenden Formulardaten kompatible sein. Aber wenn Sie strukturelle Änderungen, wie Hinzufügen, Entfernen, Umbenennen oder Verschieben von Steuerelementen, vorgenommen haben, kann die Formulardefinition mit den vorhandenen Daten nicht vereinbar sein. Wir empfehlen beim Überschreiben von einer bestehenden Version der Formulardefinition vorsichtig zu sein.
dialog-publish.open-new: Öffne neue Seite des veröffentlichten Formulars

visibility.label: Näkyvyys
visibility.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is visible or not.

  • Yes: The form control is visible.
  • No: The form control is hidden.
  • Formula: The form control is visible or hidden dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is visible or not. It must return a boolean value. The form control is visible if the formula evaluates to true(), and hidden if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

readonly.label: Vain luku
readonly.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write.

  • Yes: The form control is readonly.
  • No: The form control is read-write.
  • Formula: The form control is readonly or read-write dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write. It must return a boolean value. The form control is readonly if the formula evaluates to true(), and read-write if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

default.label: Alkuperäinen arvo
default.help:
This formula allows you to specify an initial value for the form control in "new" mode only.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

calculate.label: Laskettu arvo
calculate.help:
This formula allows you to specify a calculated value for the form control. This value is re-evaluated to remain up to date as needed.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: HUOMAA: Tämän lomakemäärittelyn julkaiseminen luo uuden lomakemäärittelyversion tietokantaan. Tietoja, jotka jo ovat tietokannassa voidaan yhä tarkastella ja editoida niillä edellisillä lomakemäärittelyversioilla, jotka liittyvät tietoihin. Uutta lomakemäärittelyversiota käytetään uusien tietojen luomiseen.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: HUOMAA: Tämä korvaa nykyisen lomakemäärittelyn. Jos lomakemäärittelyyn tekemäsi muutokset ovat pieniä tekstimuutoksia, lomakemäärittely on yhteensopiva nykyisten lomakkeiden tietojen kanssa. Jos kuitenkin olet tehnyt muutoksia lomakkeen rakenteeseen, kuten lisännyt, poistanut, uudelleennimennyt tai siirtänyt elementtejä, lomakemäärittely voi olla yhteensopimaton nykyisen tiedon kanssa. Suosittelemme huolellisuutta korvattaessa olemassa olevaa lomakemäärittelyversiota.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: NOTA: Al publicar esta definición del formulario se creará una nueva versión en la base de datos. Los datos de los formularios existentes en la base de datos serán vistos y editados en sus versiones correspondientes. Esta nueva versión se usará para crear los nuevos formularios.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: NOTA: Se sobre-escribirá la definición actual del formulario. Si los cambios realizados son chicos, como ser cambio de etiquetas, la nueva definición será compatible con la actual. Pero si se han realizado cambios estructurales, como ser, agregar, eliminar, renombrar o mover controles, la nueva versión puede ser incompatible con la actual. Se recomienda ser cauteloso al realizar esta operación.

visibility.label: Zichtbaarheid
visibility.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is visible or not.

  • Yes: The form control is visible.
  • No: The form control is hidden.
  • Formula: The form control is visible or hidden dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is visible or not. It must return a boolean value. The form control is visible if the formula evaluates to true(), and hidden if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

readonly.label: Alleen-lezen
readonly.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write.

  • Yes: The form control is readonly.
  • No: The form control is read-write.
  • Formula: The form control is readonly or read-write dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write. It must return a boolean value. The form control is readonly if the formula evaluates to true(), and read-write if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

default.label: Initiële waarde
default.help:
This formula allows you to specify an initial value for the form control in "new" mode only.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

calculate.label: Berekende waarde
calculate.help:
This formula allows you to specify a calculated value for the form control. This value is re-evaluated to remain up to date as needed.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

dialog-publish.label: Publiceer form
dialog-publish.publish-success: De formdefinitie is succesvol gepubliceerd als versie {1,number,integer}, {0,choice,0#zonder bijlagen|1#met 1 bijlage|1<met {0,number,integer} bijlagen}.
dialog-publish.publish-error: Er is een fout opgetreden tijdens het publiceren.
dialog-publish.create-new-version-item: maak een nieuwe formdefinitie met versienummer {0,number,integer}
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-item: overschrijf de huidige formdefinitie met versienummer {0,number,integer} ({1,choice,0#unavailable|1#available})
dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: MERK OP: Publiceren van deze formdefinitie maakt een nieuwe versie van de formdefinitie in de database. Bestaande gegevens in de database kunnen nog wel met de vorige versies van deze formdefinitie waaraan deze zijn gkeoppeld, worden bekeken en bewerkt. De nieuwe versie van de formdefinitie wordt gebruikt om nieuwe gegevens te maken.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: MERK OP: Hiermee overschrijft u de bestaande formdefnitie. Als de wijzigingen die u in de formdefinitie hebt gedaan klein zijn, zoals wijzigingen in control-labels, dan zal de formdefinitie compatibel zijn met bestaande formgegevens. Als u echter structuurwijzigingen hebt gedaan, zoals het toevoegen, verwijderen, hernoemen, of verplaatsen van controls, dan is de formdefinitie mogelijk incompatibel met bestaande gegevens. We raden u aan om voorzichtig te zijn bij het overschrijven van bestaande versies van formdefinities.

dialog-publish.overwrite-version-item: substituir a definição de formulário actual pela versão com número {0,number,integer} ({1,choice,0#unavailable|1#available})
dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: ATENÇÃO: A publicação desta definição do formulário irá criar uma nova versão da definição do formulário na base de dados. Os dados já existentes na base de dados continuarão a ser visualizados e editados com as versões anteriores desta definição de formulário a que os dados estão associados. A nova versão de definição de formulário será utilizada para criar novos dados.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: ATENÇÃO: Irá substituir a definição do formulário existente. Se as alterações feitas à definição do formulário forem pequenas, como alterar rótulos de controlos, a nova definição do formulário será compatível com dados do formulário existentes. Mas se você tiver efectuado alterações estruturais, como adicionar, remover, renomear ou mover controlos, a definição do formulário poderá ser incompatível com os dados existentes. Recomendamos que tenha cuidado ao substituir uma versão de definição de formulário existente.

visibility.label: Synlighet
visibility.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is visible or not.

  • Yes: The form control is visible.
  • No: The form control is hidden.
  • Formula: The form control is visible or hidden dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is visible or not. It must return a boolean value. The form control is visible if the formula evaluates to true(), and hidden if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

readonly.label: Skrivskydd
readonly.help:
This allows you to specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write.

  • Yes: The form control is readonly.
  • No: The form control is read-write.
  • Formula: The form control is readonly or read-write dynamically depending on a formula.

The formula allows you to dynamically specify whether the form control is readonly or read-write. It must return a boolean value. The form control is readonly if the formula evaluates to true(), and read-write if it evaluates to false().

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

default.label: Förvalt värde
default.help:
This formula allows you to specify an initial value for the form control in "new" mode only.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

calculate.label: Beräknat värde
calculate.help:
This formula allows you to specify a calculated value for the form control. This value is re-evaluated to remain up to date as needed.

You can refer to other form controls in the formula using their names preceded by a $ sign. When entering the $ sign, a list of available form controls is displayed.

For more about formulas, see the Form Builder documentation.

Ifyllda formulär som redan finns i databasen visas och redigeras med de tidigare versioner av formulärdefinitionen som de är associerade med. Den nya versionen av formulärdefinitionen används för nya formulär.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: OBS: Detta ersätter en existerande formulärdefinition. Om ändringarna du har gjort är små (ex: ändra i fasta texter) blir den nya formulärdefinitionen utbytbar och kan användas för redan ifyllda formulär. Men om du har gjort ändringar i strukturen (ex: lägga till eller ta bort kontroller) blir formulärdefinitionen inkompatibel med redan ifyllda formulär. Vi rekommenderar försiktighet med att ersätta existerande formulärdefinitioner.

application-name.label: اسم التطبيق
application-name.help:
اسم التطبيق هو اسم يسمح بتجميع النماذج معًا. يمكن أن يكون اسم التطبيق على سبيل المثال:

  • اسم شركة مثل "orbeon" أو "acme"
  • اسم قسم بالشركة مثل "الموارد البشرية" أو "المبيعات" أو "الهندسة"
  • اسم مشروع مثل "mercury" أو "phoenix"

يظهر هذا الاسم في عنوان URL للنموذج المنشور، لذلك نوصي باستخدام الأحرف الصغيرة فقط.

visibility.label: الرؤية
visibility.help:
يتيح لك هذا تحديد ما إذا كان عنصر التحكم في النموذج مرئياً أم لا.

  • نعم: عنصر التحكم في النموذج مرئي.
  • لا: عنصر التحكم في النموذج مخفي.
  • صيغة: عنصر التحكم في النموذج مرئي أو مخفي ديناميكياً اعتماداً على صيغة.

تتيح لك الصيغة تحديد ما إذا كان عنصر التحكم في النموذج مرئياً أم لا بشكل ديناميكي. يجب أن تُرجع قيمة منطقية. يكون عنصر التحكم في النموذج مرئياً إذا قيّمت الصيغة إلى true()، ومخفياً إذا قيّمت إلى false().

يمكنك الإشارة إلى عناصر تحكم أخرى في النموذج في الصيغة باستخدام اسمها مسبوقاً بعلامة $. عند إدخال علامة $، يتم عرض قائمة بعناصر التحكم المتاحة.

لمزيد من المعلومات حول الصيغ، راجع وثائق Form Builder.

readonly.label: للقراءة فقط
readonly.help:
يتيح لك هذا تحديد ما إذا كان عنصر التحكم في النموذج للقراءة فقط أو للقراءة والكتابة.

  • نعم: عنصر التحكم في النموذج للقراءة فقط.
  • لا: عنصر التحكم في النموذج للقراءة والكتابة.
  • صيغة: عنصر التحكم في النموذج للقراءة فقط أو للقراءة والكتابة ديناميكياً اعتماداً على صيغة.

تتيح لك الصيغة تحديد ما إذا كان عنصر التحكم في النموذج للقراءة فقط أو للقراءة والكتابة بشكل ديناميكي. يجب أن تُرجع قيمة منطقية. يكون عنصر التحكم في النموذج للقراءة فقط إذا قيّمت الصيغة إلى true()، وللقراءة والكتابة إذا قيّمت إلى false().

يمكنك الإشارة إلى عناصر تحكم أخرى في النموذج في الصيغة باستخدام اسمها مسبوقاً بعلامة $. عند إدخال علامة $، يتم عرض قائمة بعناصر التحكم المتاحة.

لمزيد من المعلومات حول الصيغ، راجع وثائق Form Builder.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: ملاحظة: نشر تعريف النموذج هذا سينشئ إصدارًا جديدًا من تعريف النموذج في قاعدة البيانات. البيانات الموجودة بالفعل في قاعدة البيانات سيتم عرضها وتحريرها باستخدام الإصدارات السابقة من تعريف هذا النموذج المرتبطة بتلك البيانات. سيتم استخدام إصدار تعريف النموذج الجديد لإنشاء بيانات جديدة.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: ملاحظة: هذا سيؤدي إلى استبدال تعريف النموذج الحالي. إذا كانت التغييرات التي أجريتها على تعريف النموذج صغيرة، مثل تغيير تسميات عناصر التحكم، فسيكون تعريف النموذج متوافقًا مع بيانات النموذج الحالية. ولكن إذا قمت بإجراء تغييرات هيكلية، مثل إضافة أو إزالة أو إعادة تسمية أو نقل عناصر التحكم، فقد يكون تعريف النموذج غير متوافق مع البيانات الحالية. نوصي بالحذر عند استبدال إصدار تعريف نموذج موجود.
